additional_info:
Storeroom, Furniture, Technique, Internet, Cable-TV, Elevator, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 2-bedroom apartment for rent:
Address:  Saburtalo district, Tbilisi, 80 sq.m
7 minutes by car to Prospekt Rustaveli, new road no traffic lights; close to Dgavahishvili University, 6th floor, 70 sq.m, 2 bedrooms (10 и 14 кв.м.) with attached bathroom and a living room with attached kitchen – 25 sq.m., terrace 14 sq.m.
Fully furnished; glazing windows, 2 A/C, satellite TV, fully equipped kitchen, central heating system, hot water, washing machine, big hall.
The house is situated in a quiet, ECO area, with view to the mountains and night city.
long-term rent is possible -  $500 per month.
